EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P - Geode - 3/13/18
EmailTemplate.subject: Geode is back at SpringOne Platform 2018!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-q118]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Join us this September 24-27, in Washington, D.C. for our biggest conference yet, and experience for yourself a variety of Geode talks, sessions, and hands-on trainings.
For the Geode community, learning and sharing go hand-in-hand. We want to hear your Geode stories and best practices. Our call for proposals <[[https://springoneplatform.io/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-q118]]> is now open and we encourage you to submit a talk. To become inspired, see 2017 Geode @ S1P highlights and presentations here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/geode-at-springone-platform-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-q118]]>. Don’t hesitate, register today <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-geode-q118]]> for SpringOne Platform and take advantage of our early-bird prices. You can use the following discount code to get an additional $100 off a conference pass: Attendee_Geode_100. We look forward to you joining us this fall!
Thank you, Jagdish
